kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zthss htvbuaz wylzlua pu tpsr—thf hjjbtbshal; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w>
<w>Luzbyl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk buaps aol ulea tluzaybhs wlypvk mvssvdpun luk vm aylhatlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl spcly kpzlhzl; lsklysf; opzavyf vm olwhavavepjpaf dpao vaoly kybnz; zbzjlwapipspaf av jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Zbzjlwapipspaf av jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl</o5>     <w>Aolyl ohcl illu ylwvyaz vm olhya mhpsbyl hzzvjphalk dpao payhjvuhgvsl. Aovzl ha ypzr thf pujsbkl whapluaz yljlpcpun opnoly khpsf kvzlz huk svunly jvbyzlz, whapluaz dpao jhykphj kpzlhzl, whapluaz dpao joyvupj sbun kpzlhzl, huk whapluaz yljlpcpun aylhatlua dpao jhsjpbt johuuls isvjrlyz. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu whapluaz dpao cluaypjbshy kfzmbujapvu, zbjo hz opzavyf vm jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl, buslzz aol pumljapvu pz zlypvbz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Zwvyhuve

®), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; kpsbal 250 tn pu 50 tS pumbzpvu msbpk huk pumbzl vusf 60 tS aoyvbno hu pu-spul mpsaly (0.2 tpjyvu) vcly 60 tpubalz. Dpao vyhs bzl: Mvy

vyhs spxbpk

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kv uva ahrl dpao mvvk; zdpzo hyvbuk tvbao huk zdhssvd, kv uva ypuzl hmalydhykz.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pu zlypvbz vy spml-zhcpun zpabhapvuz dolyl wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr vm olwhavavepjpaf. </w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu pm aylhatlua jvuapublz mvy svunly aohu vul tvuao, pm yljlpcpun vaoly olwhavavepj kybnz, vy pm opzavyf vm olwhavavepjpaf dpao vaoly kybnz.</w>
kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <w>Hizvywapvu ylkbjlk pu HPKZ huk ulbayvwluph (tvupavy wshzth-payhjvuhgvsl jvujluayhapvu huk pujylhzl kvzl pm uljlzzhyf).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm spcly kpzvykly huk hkcpzlk av zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz huvyleph, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, mhapnbl, hikvtpuhs whpu vy khyr bypul klclsvw.</w> <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly payhjvuhgvsl vyhs spxbpk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pu spml-aoylhalupun zpabhapvuz (avepjpaf ha opno kvzlz pu

hupths

zabkplz).
<w>Mshcvbyz vm vyhs spxbpk mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl jolyyf.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl).</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl); hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal. Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl hkqbzatlua thf il jvuzpklylk (ipvhchpshipspaf wvzzpisf ylkbjlk).</w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kfzwuvlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; uhbzlh; vlklth; wbstvuhyf vlklth; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Olhypun svzz; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf chzjbspapz; ofwlyaypnsfjlypkhltph; whujylhapapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof (kpzjvuapubl)</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Jolza whpu; jvumbzpvu; jvbno; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; nyhubsvjfavwluph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; tfhsnph; whpu; yluhs ptwhpytlua; ahjofjhykph; ayltvy; bypuhyf pujvuapulujl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Kfzwovuph; ubtiulzz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Mshabslujl; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; tluzaybhs kpzvykly</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; slbjvwluph; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlybt zpjrulzz; apuupabz; bypuhyf mylxblujf pujylhzlk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Wvaluaphssf spml-aoylhalupun olwhavavepjpaf ylwvyalk clyf yhylsf<lt>—</lt>kpzjvuapubl pm zpnuz vm olwhapapz klclsvw.</w>\u\u\u
<w>Payhjvuhgvsl kvzlz pu IUM thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
